Label.text: Watch the Atlas V rocket launch streaming live

ScrollView.Label:
On the day of the launch, Spaceflight now should post a link to the livestream coverage here.
If you've never watched a live launch, I highly recommend catching one. It's pretty awe-inspiring. You can set a reminder to catch this one with the bell icon directly above this text box. ulalaunch.com will also have a webcast which they indicate begins 20 minutes before launch.
